name: Sizzling Spicy Rib Eye Steaks
description: Blake and I must have had the exact same idea. Since I have rib eye steaks so rarely, I usually just opt for a simple coating of salt and pepper, but after finding a good deal on these, I wanted...
recipeIngredient: 2 boneless rib-eye steaks, about 1 1/2 inches thick

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the chili powder, black pepper, paprika, red pepper flakes, salt, and garlic.
Rub the steaks with the canola oil. Then rub in about 1 teaspoon of the dry rub on each. Set aside at room temperature for about 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, prepare a grill or warm up the broiler to high. Cook the steaks for about 8 minutes a side for medium-rare. Let them rest for about 5 minutes before diving in.
